snippet.title: Hatchwell Game Trailer (Wishlist on Steam)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1424690/Hatchwell/

Hatchwell is a top-down action RPG where the story is set in a day in this slowly changing town!

Everyone is preparing for the Hatchwell Festival, but a series of curious events will lead you helping the Mayor solve these occurrences. You must explore different areas within town and investigate situations that seem to worsen as the day goes by!

Navigate and solve puzzles using items you discover along the way to get to the bottom of this! All while learning the story of this humble town.
